item.title: Swiss Graphic Design
item.dc:creator: Chris Gargiulo
item.description: Swiss Graphic Design by Richard Hollis is a beautifully designed book on the origins and growth of the International Style from 1920-1965.
item.content:encoded: Swiss Graphic Design by Richard Hollis is a beautifully designed book on the origins and growth of the International Style from 1920-1965.

item.title: Graphic Design: A Concise History
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Part of the “World of Art” series of small books, Richard Hollis’s Graphic Design: A Concise History book provides a brief overview of the history of graphic design with accompanying visuals.
item.content:encoded: Part of the “World of Art” series of small books, Richard Hollis’s Graphic Design: A Concise History book provides a brief overview of the history of graphic design with accompanying visuals.

item.title: Homepage Usability: 50 Websites Deconstructed
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: By Jakob Nielsen. Includes an intro with Jakob Nielsen’s web usability principles based upon years of research. The 50 sites are from categories such as Fortune 500 Sites, High-Traffic Sites, and E-Commerce Sites. Although only the homepage of each site is analyzed, the critiques can be applied to overall website design. Buy on Amazon.
item.content:encoded:
By Jakob Nielsen.

Includes an intro with Jakob Nielsen’s web usability principles based upon years of research. The 50 sites are from categories such as Fortune 500 Sites, High-Traffic Sites, and E-Commerce Sites. Although only the homepage of each site is analyzed, the critiques can be applied to overall website design.

Buy on Amazon.

item.title: Javascript & JQuery
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: An easy to follow book that teaches the basics of Javascript and JQuery. Be sure to check out the book’s web site http://javascriptbook.com/ for code examples.   [button link=”http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1118008189/ref=as_li_tf_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=httpwwwhtmlan-20″ newwindow=”yes”] Buy On Amazon[/button]
item.content:encoded:
An easy to follow book that teaches the basics of Javascript and JQuery. Be sure to check out the book’s web site http://javascriptbook.com/ for code examples.

item.title: HTML & CSS
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: An easy to follow book that teaches the basics of HTML & CSS. Be sure to check out the book’s web site http://www.htmlandcssbook.com/ for code examples.
item.content:encoded:
An easy to follow book that teaches the basics of HTML & CSS. Be sure to check out the book’s web site http://www.htmlandcssbook.com/ for code examples.

item.title: Butterick’s Practical Typography
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: An online book (https://practicaltypography.com/) on typography by Matthew Butterick, a writer, ty­pog­ra­pher, and law­yer in Los Angeles. Foreword by Erik Spiek­er­mann.
item.content:encoded: An online book (https://practicaltypography.com/) on typography by Matthew Butterick, a writer, ty­pog­ra­pher, and law­yer in Los Angeles. Foreword by Erik Spiek­er­mann.

item.title: Designing with Web Standards
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: by Jeffrey Zeldman and Ethan Marcotte
